conf.name: patch
conf.description: Includes the patched jars that are required to be put ahead of other jars in the classpath.

conf.name: patchjboss
conf.description: Includes the patched jars that are required to be put ahead of other jars in the JBoss (EAR) classpath.

conf.name: patchtomcat
conf.description: Includes the patched jars that are required to be put ahead of other jars in the Tomcat classpath.
